keywords: ['choral melody', 'male voices', 'choir backing', 'comedy song', 'gospel feel', 'piano backing', 'moderate tempo', 'sound of laughter']
caption: This comedy song features a male voice singing the main melody followed by another male continuing the melody. This is accompanied by a piano playing staccato chords in a melody similar to the voices. A choir sings vocables in harmony in the background. There are no other instruments in this song. This song can be played in a comedy movie.
